Literature.Title: Development of New Antimicrobial Agents from Cationic PG-Surfactants Containing Oligo-Lys Peptides.
Literature.Author: Kimura R, Shibata M, Koeda S, Miyagawa A, Yamamura H, Mizuno T

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli K-12 W3110(MIC=4µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium LT2(MIC=8µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus FDA 209P(MIC=4µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=4µg/ml)
